STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_1:
Terms & Conditions

Welcome to Ticketbox! The following are the terms of use (“Terms”) that govern your use of the websites and applications where this appears (collectively, the “Site”). Our Privacy Policy and any other policies, rules or guidelines that may be applicable to particular offers or features on the Site are also incorporated into these Terms. By visiting or using the Site, you expressly agree to these Terms, as updated from time to time.
While some of the events listed on the Site may appeal to children, the Site is not targeted at children under the age of 13, and they are not permitted to use the Site. We strongly encourage all parents and guardians to monitor the Internet use by their children. If you use the Site, you affirm you are at least 13 years old. Billing Information Verification
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_2:
Billing Information Verification

Orders are processed only after a billing address and other billing information have been verified. Occasionally, we receive incorrect billing or credit card account information for a ticket package order that can delay processing and delivery. In these cases, customer service will attempt to contact you, using the information provided at the time of purchase. If we are unable to reach you after our initial attempt, we may cancel your order and may sell your ticket package to another customer without further notice.
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_3:
Lost or Stolen Tickets

When you receive your tickets keep them in a safe place. Unfortunately, tickets cannot be replaced if they are lost, stolen, or damaged. Please note that direct sunlight and heat can damage some tickets.
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_4:
License and Ejection

A ticket is a revocable license and admission may be refused. A ticket is not redeemable for cash. Breach of terms or rules will terminate your license to attend the event without refund. Event providers reserve the right, without refund of any amount paid, to refuse admission to, or eject, any person whose conduct management deems disorderly, who uses vulgar or abusive language or who fails to comply with event provider rules.
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_5:
Recording, Transmission and Exhibition

You agree that the event for which you purchase tickets is a public event, that your appearance and actions inside and outside the venue where the event occurs are public in nature, and that you have no expectation of privacy with regard to your actions or conduct at the event. You grant permission to us and the event provider(s) to utilize your name, image, likeness, acts, poses, plays, appearance, movements, and statements in any live or recorded audio, video, or photographic display or other transmission, exhibition, publication or reproduction made of, or at, the event (regardless of whether before, during or after play or performance) for any purpose, in any manner, in any medium or context now known or hereafter developed, without further authorization from, or compensation to, you or anyone acting on your behalf.
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_6:
You Are Subject to Search

You and your belongings may be searched on entry to the event. You consent to such searches and waive any related claims that may arise. If you elect not to consent to such searches, you may be denied entry to the event without refund or other compensation. Under certain facility rules, certain items may not be brought into the premises, including without limitation, alcohol, drugs, controlled substances, cameras, recording devices, laser pointers, strobe lights, irritants (e.g., artificial noisemakers), bundles and containers.
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_7:
Standing Section:

1. Standing sections are only open to adults and minors _5___ to ___17__ years old. Minors must be accompanied by a ticket bearing guardian in the same section (_1:_3 ratio)
2. Parents/guardians will be responsible for their kids’ safety at all times.
3. Minors without parents/guardians will not be allowed in the standing section.
4. Pregnant women and patrons with medical condition/s are not allowed in the standing section.
5. Only Maximum of 4 tickets are allowed to purchase per transaction.
6. People under 1.4 meters should be aware that their views maybe obstructed, please do not bring the supportive things to stand on
7. We recommend families with children to book zones D and F - the seating zones
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_8:
For All Seated Sections:

1. Seated sections are open to all ages including minors. Minors must be accompanied by a ticket bearing adult / guardian in the same section (_1:_3 ratio maximum)
2. Parents/guardians will be responsible for their kids’ safety at all times.
3. Pregnant women and patrons with medical condition/s are required to declare their conditions and medications at the entrance.
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_9:
Check-in location and time information will be emailed out by TICKETBOX 3-5 days prior to the day of the show. If you have not received this 3 days before the show please contact us immediately at cs@ticketbox.vn or operation.team@ticketbox.vn
All tickets are non-refundable. Non transfer or re-sold ticket.
You must bring a valid photo ID matching the purchaser/attendee name on this order. Those who cannot present a photo ID matching the purchaser name on the order will be turned away.
If you have any questions regarding the ticket portion of your purchase or have not received your confirmation email, please email support@ticketbox.vn OR CALL (08) 7300 7998.
TICKET CANNOT BE RESOLD. Please check with the venue directly for any age restrictions.
STEP_QUESTION_FORM.ARIANA_TERM_CONFIRM: I agree with these terms and conditions.

STEP2.FREE_OP_TERM:
Tickets are free and are only for admission to the YouTube FanFest main show taking place in Ho Chi Minh City on August 26, 2017. They do not include Meet & Greet or Creator Camp.

Purchasing for someone other than yourself/re-selling or buying tickets from an outside vendor is prohibited.

Attendees under 15 must be accompanied by an adult 18 years old or older at all times.

Entry will not be permitted in the absence of a valid government-issued photo ID or school ID with proof of age.

Transport and hotel fees are not included in the tickets.

The holder of this ticket grants its organizers and sponsors the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder’s appearance on any channel or magazine for broadcast in any and all media globally and for advertising, publicity and promotions relating hereto without any further approval of yours.

Rights of admission reserved at management’s discretion, even to valid ticket holders.

Areas at the event are built to capacity. Management reserves the right to hold entry to certain areas within the event to ensure a safe experience. If the venue reaches capacity, there is a possibility that entry will be refused.

Security procedures could apply, including frisking remain the right of the management.

No tickets for the event shall be used by any person for re-sale, advertising, promotional or commercial purposes, including but not limited to prizes, competition, contests or sweepstakes.

The event line-up and artist programming may change without official notice – Please check YouTube FanFest homepage for recent updates.

Filming on a personal device (included but not limited to camera, phone camera, video camera, tape recorder) is prohibited.

The following items are not permitted in the event and may be ejected with or without the owner from the venue:

- Only soft, paper or cardboard banners that can be held by one person are allowed – No Oversized posters/banners/placards/signages with sticks or poles – NO LED Banners
- Obscene photos, vulgar language or political content printed on shirts or on carried-in articles such as posters, banners, placards and/or signages
- Professional cameras
- Non authorized professional recording equipment for unauthorized people/journalist without accredited badge
- Hard containers: Glass, PET/aluminum bottles, canned drinks, hard plastic containers
- Illegal substances including drugs, alcoholic drinks
- Liquids, alcohol, cigarettes and banned substances including outside food and drink
- Pyrotechnic items including fireworks, candles, lighters
- Dangerous or potentially hazardous objects including but not limited to weapons, knives, guns, laser devices, iron bar, wooden bar, sharp object or material, helmets
- Any suspicious casual objects which can be used as a weapon or projectile including tools, chemicals, suspicious powder, umbrellas, selfie sticks
- Dangerous sport items including golf clubs, baseball bats, any kind of ball
- Flammable material including alcohol, gasoline, kerosene, pressurized cologne
- Any type of chairs
- Pets or animals

Backpacks and waist packs will be subject to inspection

The sponsors/bands/organizers/management are not responsible for, including but not limited any injury or damage that may occur during or at the event.

This event uses amplified sound. Earplugs and hearing protection at live concerts toreduce the risk of hearing damage is recommended, especially for children.

Strobe lighting at this event may trigger epileptic fits. Those with a history of epilepsy or any health condition that would be of concern must take adequate precautions.Consumption and possession of narcotics is strictly prohibited and those found possessing or consuming narcotics at the event will be immediately handed over to the anti-narcotics police.
No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink or any other consumption will be entertained by the management.
Any claims that may arise due to gross negligence will be settled exclusively in the courts in Vietnam.

Management will refuse entry to people under the influence of alcohol and other banned substances.

We encourage you to be cool and have a great time at FanFest!

The Terms and Conditions stated herein may be subject to change as deemed necessary by the Organizers and Sponsors of YouTube FanFest without prior notice.
STEP2.WE_RACE_TERM:
In registering, you indicate your understanding and agreement to the following:

I know that running in a road race might be a potentially hazardous activity. I will not enter and race unless I am medically able and properly trained. I agree to abide by any decisions of a race official relative to my ability to safely complete race. I assume all risks associated with racing this event, which cannot be eliminated completely, ranging from minor injuries to catastrophic injuries, including, but not limited to tripping and falling, contacting with other participants, the effects of weather, traffic and the conditions of the road and death, all such risks being known and acknowledged by me. Having read this waiver and knowing these facts and in consideration of acceptance of my entry, I, for myself and anyone entitled to act on my behalf, waive and release the race and Ho Chi Minh City, its board members, officers, employees, sponsors, partners, volunteers, contractors, subcontractors, and agents, their representatives and successors from, and agree not to sue any of the foregoing on, any and all claims or liabilities of any kind arising out of my participation in this event even though that liability may arise out of negligence, whether sole, joint, concurrent, or gross, or carelessness on the part of the person named in this waiver. I grant permission to all of the foregoing to use photographs, motion pictures, recordings, or any other record of my participation in this event for any legitimate purpose and I understand that my name will be posted on www.weace.vn or other organizer’s channels as a participant of the 2017 event. I also understand that my entry fee is non-transferable and non-refundable. In case of complimentary entries, the runner will be eligible to podium but this will not receive any kind of cash of sponsor prize, only the trophy. All information of the participants must be filled in during the registration process. Otherwise the participants might not be eligible for ranking as a winner.

In the event of inclement weather and the organizer has decided to call off or stop the event, I agree to abide by their decision and if I decide otherwise, I acknowledge all the risks involved and hereby waive & release the race, its organizers and Ho Chi Minh City, from any and all claims or liabilities.

In the event that I am not able to pick up the race kit personally and another person will collect the kit in my behalf, such person is hereby authorized to sign this waiver on my behalf, provided an authorization letter from me is presented upon race kit collection.

If you are registering a child under the age of 18 or an incapacitated adult you represent and warrant that you are the parent or legal guardian of that party and have the legal authority to enter into this agreement on their behalf and by proceeding with this event registration, you agree that the terms of this Agreement and Waiver shall apply equally to all Registered Parties.

BANKTRANSFER.BANKTRANSFER_FEE: Interbank transfer fee will be at buyer's expense. Its value may vary across banks under Transfer Fee List.

MOCA.INTRO: Moca is a convenient mobile payment option which allows you to pay with your smartphone. Your card’s information is securely tokenized, so only you and your bank have access to your card details as well as bank account. You don’t need to enter your card details on a website. If you’re paying from your phone, it’s as simple as clicking a button!
MOCA.PROMOTION: 30,000VNĐ discount on first Moca payment. Use Promocode: TKM30. For more information: goo.gl/bmMQce
MOCA.DESCRIPTION: Electronic ticket will be sent to you via email automatically after payment confirmation.
MOCA.DESCRIPTION_STEP1: 1. Open the Moca app and use your phone’s camera to scan the Moca QRCode displayed on the screen.
MOCA.DESCRIPTION_STEP2: 2. Confirm your payment – Enter your CVV
MOCA.DESCRIPTION_MANUAL3: Get Moca at www.moca.vn/pass or from the App Store and Google Play

MOMO.INTRO: E-tickets will be sent to you via email after payment.
MOMO.ENTRY: MoMo is known as the first e-wallet that allows users to withdraw money from their bank accounts. MoMo e-wallet is 100% secured and authorized by Vietcombank. The service does not charge the receiver and the procedure is extremely simple. Dozens of banks in Vietnam are in cooperation with MoMo with more than 5,000 outlets across the country. MoMo e-wallet will surely meet the online payment needs of Vietnamese customers.
MOMO.DESCRIPTION_MANUAL: How to make payment with MoMo service?
MOMO.DESCRIPTION_STEP1: Step 1: Sign in your MoMo e-wallet
MOMO.WEBSITE: MoMo e-wallet has been available on AppStore and Google Play. Download app MoMo at www.momo.vn.
MOMO.ATTENTION: Attention: DO NOT close Ticketbox’s browser tab while your payment is being processed by Momo. Please wait until your payment is completed.

THANKYOU.QUESTION_FEEDBACK_PLEASE_CONTACT: Any question or feedback, please contact us via Email support@ticketbox.vn or Hotline 1900.6408 (VI) & 091.333.2198 (EN & VI).
THANKYOU.BANK_TRANSFER_NOTE: Tickets will be sent via email within 1 workday after transfer completed. If you don't receive the tickets, please contact us at 1900.6408 - 091.333.2198 or email support@ticketbox.vn (Mon - Fri: 8:30am - 7:30pm).
THANKYOU.EXPIRE_PAYMENT_2: . After this deadline, your booking is cancelled.
THANKYOU.FREE_PICKUP_AT_EVENT_NOTE:
- Ticketbox will check your submission.
- First 800 participants who completed all requirements will receive confirmation email on Friday (2/2/2018) or Saturday (3/2/2018).
- Please print the confirmation email and bring along the event, or show us on your smartphone to redeem physical tickets at door.

Noted: Please come to event one hour before the show.

ERROR_MESSAGE.DMISSINGFIELD: The request is missing one or more required fields:
ERROR_MESSAGE.DAVSNO: The authorization request was approved by the issuing bank but declined by CyberSource because it did not pass the Address Verification Service (AVS) check.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DCARDREFUSED_203: General decline of the card. No other information provided by the issuing bank.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DCARDREFUSED_207: Issuing bank unavailable. (Wait a few minutes and resend the request).
ERROR_MESSAGE.DCARDREFUSED_208: Inactive card or card not authorized for card-not-present transactions.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DCARDREFUSED_210: The card has reached the credit limit.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DCHECKREFUSED_221: The customer matched an entry on the processor's negative file.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DCV: The authorization request was approved by the issuing bank but declined by CyberSource because it did not pass the card verification number (CVN) check.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DINVALIDDATA_232: The card type is not accepted by the payment processor.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DINVALIDDATA_234: There is a problem with your CyberSource merchant configuration.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DINVALIDDATA_236: Processor failure. (Wait a few minutes and resend the request.)
ERROR_MESSAGE.DINVALIDDATA_240: The card type sent is invalid or does not correlate with the credit card number.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DAUTHENTICATE: The cardholder is enrolled in Payer Authentication. Please authenticate the cardholder before continuing with the transaction.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DAUTHENTICATIONFAILED: Encountered a Payer Authentication problem. Payer could not be authenticated.
ERROR_MESSAGE.DREVIEW: The order is marked for review by Decision Manager
ERROR_MESSAGE.DREJECT: The order has been rejected by Decision Manager
